description:
Sakamoto Ryouma and his two foreign friends steal the seal required to activate the Susanowo from Kei`ichiro.  To win it back he`s forced to play a game of strip rock paper scissors, with Kiriko stripping!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dejima Dawn, the Greatest Fist in Japan!
Dejima no Yoake, Tenkaichi no Kenze yo!
Lever du jour sur Dejima ; le poing le plus puissant du pays !
出島の夜明け, 天下一の拳ぜよ!
